mapper.select: SELECT b.bd_id AS boardId, b.bd_title AS boardTitle, b.bd_content AS boardContent, b.bd_created_at AS boardCreatedAt, b.bd_hit AS boardHit, m.mbr_seq AS memberId, m.mbr_nm AS memberName FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.mbr_seq = m.mbr_seq ORDER BY bd_id;

SELECT b.bd_id AS boardId, b.bd_title AS boardTitle, b.bd_content AS boardContent, b.bd_created_at AS boardCreatedAt, b.bd_hit AS boardHit, m.mbr_nm AS memberName FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.mbr_seq = m.mbr_seq WHERE b.bd_id = #{boardId};
